channel.title: algorithms on 逃避虽然可耻但有用
channel.description: Recent content in algorithms on 逃避虽然可耻但有用

item.title: 生成不重复的随机数
item.description: 下面代码就可以生成1-100区间的随机数： #include <vector>#include <algorithms> std::vector<int> random_numbers; for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 100; ++i) random_numbers.push_back(i + 1); std::random_shuffle(random_numbers.begin(), random_numbers.end());
